body.p: comes bundled with a DITA-OT CSS-based PDF Publishing Plugin for transforming DITA maps or single topics to PDF, while styling the resulting output using CSS. It is the base of two types of transformation scenarios:

section.title: DITA Map Transformation Type ()
section.p: This transformation type converts DITA maps to PDF using a CSS-based processing engine and HTML5 as an intermediate format. For this transformation, the pdf-css-html5 transtype is used. Because the structure of the HTML5 intermediate format resembles the one used in WebHelp output, it is possible to reuse parts of your CSS file you developed for a WebHelp customization.

section.title: Single Topic Transformation Type ()
section.p: This transformation type converts a single DITA topic to PDF using a CSS-based processing engine and HTML5 as an intermediate format. For this transformation, the pdf-css-html5-single-topic transtype is used. This transformation is derived from the transformation type but applies on a single topic.
